attributes.action: Raise Wages for Domiciliary and Community Care Workers in the UK
attributes.background: Despite the essential nature of our role, care workers are still among the lowest paid. Many of us are earning minimum wage while taking on responsibilities that are physically and emotionally demanding. We provide frontline, life-changing support, yet we are not treated or paid as professionals.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Increase the minimum wage for care workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727420
